avRegistration.helpRegisterForm: To be able to vote, you need to register first. Some fields are required, so please look carefully at the help information.
avRegistration.helpAdminRegisterForm: To be able to create elections, you need to register first. Please look carefully at the help information.
avRegistration.fillValidFormText: To be able to send the form, please fill correctly first all the fields.
avRegistration.invalidRegisterData: There was an error doing the registration with the data you provided. Most probably you are already registered, access using with your credentials clicking here. It's possible that the election has finished. Check all the above, and if you continue having trouble in the registration, review the data you provided, or contact with the election administrators,
avRegistration.invalidRegisterDNI: We couldn't registered you with the data you provided. You inserted an invalid ID number. Please, review it.
avRegistration.codeHelp: Please use the last code we have sent to you. The code will have 8 alphanumeric characters.
avRegistration.noCodeReceivedQuestion: Did not receive your code yet?
avRegistration.telInvalid: Invalid telephone number. Example of valid number: +34666666666
avRegistration.telHelp: Only numbers, with no spaces or hyphens. Always use your country telephone international prefix, for example +44 for UK or +34 for Spain.
avRegistration.errorSendingAuthCode: Error sending the code. Please review that you wrote correctly all the data, or maybe you sent the code too many times. If the problem persist, contact with the organization.
avRegistration.fewMinutes: It only takes a few minutes
avRegistration.helpAlreadyRegisteredForm: Maybe you are already registered and what you really need is to authenticate.
avRegistration.loginHere: Access using my credentials, I have already registered before
avRegistration.invalidCredentials:
Authentication failed, possibly for one of the following reasons:
- Credentials are invalid
- The user is not active
- The user has exceeded the maximum number of allowed revotes for this election
- There is a technical problem in the server
If the problem persists, please contact support at __support__
avRegistration.dniHelp: Specify a valid  DNI/NIE. Examples: 12343567R or X01234356R
avRegistration.imageHelp: Add an image in jpg or png format

documentation.title: Documentation
